paragraphs.first: This is a personality test -cum- people connecting platform
paragraphs.test_evaluation: Tests and evaluation is gathered from
paragraphs.the_following: The following test contains a series of questions which is estimated to take you about
paragraphs.after_submitted: After you have submitted the test you will receive a detailed personality report in the following domains:
paragraphs.openess: Openness to experience, Conscientiousness, Extraversion, Agreeableness and Neuroticism.
paragraphs.tip1: Answer honestly, even if you don't like the answer
paragraphs.tip2: Describe yourself as you generally are now, not as you wish to be in the future
paragraphs.tip3: Your spontaneous answer is usually the most accurate
paragraphs.select_language: Select the language in which you want to see the test displayed in
